head.title: Best Buy Awards Accounts To BBDO and Crispin Porter

hedline.hl1: Best Buy Awards Accounts To BBDO and Crispin Porter

block.p: Best Buy in Minneapolis has awarded large assignments to two agencies.
The brand advertising account, previously handled internally, went to BBDO Worldwide in New York, part of the Omnicom Group. Spending was estimated at $170 million to $200 million.
Best Buy in Minneapolis has awarded large assignments to two agencies.
The brand advertising account, previously handled internally, went to BBDO Worldwide in New York, part of the Omnicom Group. Spending was estimated at $170 million to $200 million.

Best Buy also expanded its relationship with Crispin Porter & Bogusky in Miami, part of MDC Partners, by awarding the agency new assignments that include business development and in-store marketing. Spending has not been determined.

Crispin Porter, which creates campaigns for the Best Buy Geek Squad service, was a finalist in a review for the brand account along with BBDO New York and GSD&M in Austin, Tex., also owned by Omnicom.
